title: New Doro Phones 2018: Doro 7060 and 8035 revealed at MWC
description: ![]()These two new phones join the Doro 6520, a 3G clamshell number, to give thecompany a tidy selection of devices across the elderly phone spectrum.We’ll be reviewing them in full in the near future, so stay tuned for morebeyond these early impressions.**What’s your favourite Doro phone? Tweet your opinions to us@TrustedReviews.**
